Back-door Access Package

This package provide abstract class definitions for making back-door accessing to memory.

Summary
Back-door Access PackageThis package provide abstract class definitions for making back-door accessing to memory.
Class Constructor
newCreate the initializes an instance of this class using normal constructor arguments for <uvm_component> : ~name~ is the name of the instance.
Virtual MethodsPrototype of Virtual Method.
bd_access_readVirtual function definition for READ ACCESS TO MEMORY.
bd_access_writeVirtual function definition for writ ACCESS TO MEMORY.

Class Constructor

new

function new(string name =  "")

Create the initializes an instance of this class using normal constructor arguments for <uvm_component> : ~name~ is the name of the instance.

Virtual Methods

Prototype of Virtual Method.

bd_access_read

pure virtual function bit [(`DATA_WIDTH-1):0] bd_access_read (
   bit[(`ADDRESS_WIDTH-1):0] addr
)

Virtual function definition for READ ACCESS TO MEMORY.  It will return <read data> from <addr>.Implementation of this function is present in <bd_mem_derived.svh>.

bd_access_write

pure virtual function void bd_access_write (bit[(`ADDRESS_WIDTH-1):0] addr,
bit [(`DATA_WIDTH-1):0] data)

Virtual function definition for writ ACCESS TO MEMORY.  It will write the <data> to <addr> passed with this function.Implementation of this function is present in <bd_mem_derived.svh>.
